html:
8.17.22  2:25 pm   How much of your music is affected by your personal life?

      all of it is affected 50%

8.17.22  2:20 pm   have you ever tried making a song without using any notes?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.17.22  2:04 pm   Opinions on telephone poles

      they're so complex, there must be some exact regional specifics in there somewhere, but i've never had the time to properly figure that out

8.17.22  12:14 pm   are you a wizard?

      no, but i know a couple of wizard gestures, which are pretty convenient to say the least

8.17.22  11:27 am   When you said "(yrghwrh)" in "If the World Doesn't End", I felt that in my entire body. That's the power of the groove & I know you feel it too

     it's been my new years resolution to put more improvised vocal feelings into otherwise scripted vocal material

8.17.22  11:02 am   what if i don't have time to do the other productive things i want to do because i'm forced to do things i don't care about due to peer pressure, social norms, the establishment, and whatever?

     sometimes having less time for what you want can keep it more interesting, and inspired. having too much time available can result in a different affliction known as 'boredom'

     do i just naturally end up hating society and life

      you could, but that seems like a drag

8.17.22  9:42 am   do you have a favorite soft thing?

      i have yet to find anything soft enough for me

8.17.22  9:42 am   is music just domesticated noise?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.17.22  9:25 am   I like your music, what are your opinions on carnivals?

      too good. don't go

8.17.22  8:50 am   where can i ride a ground plane

      right where you are

8.17.22  7:05 am   Favorite way to order a steak? 

      mail order

8.17.22  6:16 am   you ever give yourself motion sickness using your computer.  eugh

      no, but that sounds exciting

8.17.22  2:33 am   Is traveling to Hawaii island too far, crowded, and expensive at all?

      the hardest part is finding it. when you buy a ticket to hawaii, that's mostly what you're paying for. otherwise you'd be searching for a while

8.16.22  11:24 pm   how did you achieve the pixel effect in soft clothing  

      let's just say i crunched some numbers

8.16.22  9:25 pm   Hey, can you make the time go by faster? I'm kind tired of waiting.

      i took care of it. all the time has passed now

8.16.22  7:14 pm   What's the magic word? Are there secretly more than one

      yes, they're all magic

8.16.22  6:10 pm   Do you think that if nobody ever heard of Shakespeare until today, he'd still eventually come to be known as one of the greatest writers of all time? Like, if one day someone just found a trunk in their cellar that had all of Shakespeare's manuscripts in there and he was just discovered in 2022? 

      being alive helps, also speaking present day language fluently (or beyond!) helps. which are likely shakespeare's very strong points. so, as long as you'll let him be alive in your analogy, then he'll probably do great in any time

8.16.22  5:00 pm   Will the word "potato" make a guest appearance in the new song?

      no

8.16.22  3:01 pm   What's the story behind 'if the world doesn't end'?

      it's when you get scared the world could end, but then start optimistically thinking about the possibility that life may go on

8.16.22  12:39 pm   does wearing rough clothing make you feel soft?

      no

8.16.22  11:05 am   I've been trying to learn songs on keyboard but only the right hand because I suck at this and I am struggling on the finger acrobatics you have to do to play the super-far-apart notes. Do you have tips for this,

      yes. as long as you mean what you say (mean what you play) while you are playing it, your physical hands will have 20x more skill. to start building up an intuition of what everything means, just start as small as you have to. start with 1 note. sit around all afternoon pressing that note until you figure out how to use it meaningfully. and work your way up from there. the physics will learn itself over time, as long as you mean what you play. just how your lips and mouth learned the 1000s of different positions you use in probably every sentence

8.16.22  10:04 am   Is the second word of your next song "going"?

      no

8.16.22  8:23 am   was it an accident that i like to wear soft clothing came out on a Tuesday?

      no

8.16.22  6:49 am   What key is your next song in

      A, and more

8.16.22  4:27 am   What can be so great but then not so great once in a while?

      the winds of change

8.16.22  3:37 am   sitting here, in my chair, trying to pluck out chords and notes and melodies in my DAW, on my little microKORG, whilst also occasionally going through your improv page, leads me to wonder what the point of music even really is? Is it to make something cool? Are we making music to please others or to please ourselves? both? does it even matter?

      the point is to provide point-finding opportunities for all the point-finders out there

8.16.22  1:28 am   where did you find the idea for your next song,

     at the keyboard

      or if you can't say that without spoiling it, the idea for "soft clothing"

      sometimes it's fun to start with an elaborate title with a plot twist built in

8.16.22  12:59 am   do ground planes also go underground

      no

8.15.22  10:19 pm   When was your next song written?

      this month

8.15.22  8:21 pm   would you cry if someone threw red paint on your best suit

      no

8.15.22  7:36 pm   I had a weird dream that your next song has the F word in it. Does it?

      there are 4 words that start with F

8.15.22  5:18 pm   what isn't the title of your next song?

      hey now you're an all star

8.15.22  4:32 pm   how do you usually deal with personal conflicts?

      put on a game show

8.15.22  2:08 pm   Are Legos cringe?

      only if you get one in your shoe

8.15.22  12:27 pm   can you make music

      i'll see what i can do

8.15.22  12:19 pm   how do you organize your notes?

      by date

8.15.22  9:27 am   how to achieve something great in life to be remembered for?

      invent the... sequel to the wheel

8.15.22  9:48 am   do you like noise?

      occasionally

8.15.22  8:58 am   what is your favorite type of clothing?

      enormous

8.15.22  8:06 am   I have two parakeets. Do you want them?

      no

8.15.22  7:05 am   you seem like the type of person to appreciate balloons. are you a balloon appreciator?

      i accept them

8.15.22  6:04 am   why did you spell it "uck" in the video but "ughf" in the lyrics ??

      keep my options open

8.15.22  3:28 am   does your next song have words?

      yes

8.15.22  2:24 am   Should I go up the stairs or down the stairs?

      i wonder if you could go across the middle of the stairs

8.15.22  12:59 am   favorite whitney houston moment?

      "there's a boy i know, he's the one i dream of"

8.14.22  11:26 pm   what's the 5th chord of your next song

      D/A

8.14.22  10:52 pm   my money now smells like cinnamon because of my air freshener.

     i understand

     how do you use a toothpick?

     start comparing things to it. you'd be surprised at how different most things are from a toothpick

8.14.22  8:16 pm   Opinion on Shrek?

      i've blocked it out of my memory

8.14.22  7:49 pm   can you tell me something that has happened before

      i'm making a list

8.14.22  5:26 pm   how do you personally deal with unsightly computer wires, if you do at all? 

      all of my computer wires are extremely sightly
